subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets and the free-agent outfielder Moises Alou are close to agreeing on a one-year contract for $8 million to 10 million, a major league executive with knowledge of the negotiations said on Saturday.
snippet: The Mets and the free-agent outfielder Moises Alou are close to agreeing on a one-year contract for $8 million to 10 million, a major league executive with knowledge of the negotiations said on Saturday.
